name: GunSafe
description: A firearm detection and alert system using beacons to notify authorities in case of unauthorized firearm presence in secure zones.

name: Budget for a Cause
description: A budgeting tool for effective charitable donations, allowing users to set monthly giving goals and distribute funds to selected charities.

name: Never Expire
description: A food tracking app that notifies users of expiring items to reduce food waste.

name: Dementia Helper
description: A facial recognition app that announces the names and details of visitors to dementia patients to aid recognition and comfort.

name: Altruist
description: A social platform connecting donors with recipients in need, especially during natural disasters.

name: TransitU
description: An app for students that optimizes commuting schedules using live bus data, assisting with timely arrival based on their class schedules.

name: WeCU
description: A mental health check-in app for students and patients, providing daily surveys to track mood, energy levels, and offer support resources.

name: CHAAP: Chat With Any Anonymous Page
description: A Chrome extension that enables conversations with any webpage, supporting multiple LLMs like AWS, OLLaMA, and GPT. It includes HEMLock algorithm to protect user data from being used for model pretraining.

name: QueryPages
description: A framework that facilitates conversations with organizational data, allowing companies to securely train the llama2 model on internal data and policies.

name: BardTales
description: A generative AI-powered tool that converts written text into professional-quality audiobooks with voice narration and music.

name: CapSoul
description: An app for digital wardrobe management, providing personalized daily outfit suggestions and tracking fashion consumption for sustainability. It also includes fabric care guidance.

name: Paisa
description: An OCR-powered expense management tool designed to split bills seamlessly from receipts.

name: GRAID
description: An AI-enhanced grading platform that includes webcam proctoring, assignment management, and student-grader communication features. Competes with platforms like Canvas.

name: Datox
description: A platform connecting clients with freelancers for complex data needs, simplifying the process significantly for customers.

name: Super Awesome Shiba Inu Website
description: A website to generate endless pictures of Shiba Inus paired with inspiring phrases, with style customization options.

name: Academath
description: An educational platform for calculus topics, including limits, derivatives, integrals, and Riemann Sums, with adaptive difficulty levels and achievements.

name: CloseTalk
description: An app that connects people nearby without exchanging contact information, utilizing Bluetooth and NearBy protocol for secure, anonymous networking.

name: SafeSpace
description: An app providing anonymous crime reporting, resource access, safe route mapping, and personalized safety plans, plus secure event documentation.

name: Scribble Beasts
description: Hosts an online server for playing the game Scribble Beasts.

name: Audio Visualizer
description: An audio visualizer that offers various visualizations for audio files, including frequency volume and oscilloscope displays.

name: PhishEye
description: A phishing detection tool that leverages AI to flag potential phishing elements in emails, with educational features to increase awareness.

name: Novice Finance
description: A finance app featuring ML modules for startup success prediction, loan approval, default estimation, and customer churn forecasting.

name: LimitLess
description: A calculus learning app with daily practice reminders, adaptive difficulty levels, and bite-sized info on solving derivatives and integrals.

name: Positive Casino
description: A slots game that provides users with random advice instead of traditional results, including mental health resources like SAMHSA.

name: Ucases
description: A tool that generates new practice questions based on exam questions provided in a PDF for students' practice.

name: CodeScope
description: Uses web scraping and OpenAI to compare hackathon projects on Devpost, offering insights and similarity scores for judges.

name: Best Dressed
description: A virtual shopping app where users can create profiles, save clothing preferences, and try on outfits virtually before purchasing.

name: CtrlAltEsc
description: A secure authentication service that provides temporary bank credentials, incorporating encryption, fraud detection, and expiration alerts.

name: More than Twins
description: A digital clone project showing visual effects of different drugs on a 3D human model based on Arduino input.

name: PhizzIO
description: An interactive platform connecting patients and physiotherapists, with features for real-time movement tracking, patient analytics, and personalized treatment plans.

name: RF Shield
description: Maps cellular tower locations and identifies RF-shielded areas, displaying RF-free zones and providing relevant news about RF developments.

name: Memento
description: A digital journal for users with cognitive diseases, storing entries as memories and providing summaries to support independence and track symptoms.

name: GameGenie
description: An app that generates schedules and scorecards for card games like Hearts and Euchre.

name: Plant Parenthood
description: A plant database for gardeners to log and track plant information, including planting dates and care details.

name: Gravity-Glide-VR
description: A VR game where users experience swinging in a simulated environment, testing their fear of heights.

name: InstantMed
description: An app for browsing medicines with an AI chatbot for health queries and medicine recommendations.

name: ProxyVerse
description: A microphone sharing tool that streams audio between nearby Android devices using the Nearby Connections API.

name: Campus Palate
description: A dining app for students, recommending campus food options based on dietary requirements and preferences.

name: Spotify Rex
description: A music recommendation and social engagement app allowing users to share, react, and discuss favorite songs and artists.

name: Trust Skin
description: An AI-powered skincare platform that explains ingredients, matches customers with dermatologists, and provides treatment and maintenance advice.

name: Hackathon Team Creator
description: An app for assigning hackathon team locations, updating room occupancy, and ensuring even distribution of teams.

name: No1Best Compliance
description: A compliance tracking website for companies to publicly display their adherence to data policies.

name: Pneumonia-de.tech
description: A machine learning tool for detecting pneumonia from chest X-rays, with a website showcasing its diagnostic capabilities.

name: Nonogram Solver
description: An algorithmic solver for nonogram puzzles using CNF and a satisfiability solver.

name: HealthSphere
description: A health platform providing personalized insights and wellness tools through data analytics, covering physical, mental, and emotional health.

name: Lingual Links
description: A language-learning platform with lessons, quizzes, and native speaker chat for immersive practice.

name: Feline Fury!
description: A card game based on cat statistics compiled from a cat facts database.

name: EquationQuest
description: A math practice game with multiple modes including Focus, High Score, and Time Attack.

name: Fluid Simulation & Render
description: A point-based fluid simulation in a bounded volume with surface generation via the marching cubes algorithm.

name: B.A.T
description: A robot that follows users and shouts humorous insults when in close range.

name: Stock O' Clock
description: A stock information website where users can input symbols and receive stock data.

name: Meetcode
description: An interactive DSA learning platform supporting collaborative coding, visualizations, and pair programming.

name: Symptom Reporter
description: A tool for users to log symptoms, create notes, and upload images for review by medical practitioners.

name: Clinical Research Journal
description: A platform for clinical trial participants to track schedules, contacts, and log personal reflections.

name: hr-connect
description: A feedback collection tool for employees and managers to support productivity reviews and career development.

name: Who Got Next?
description: An app for queue management at sports courts, including features for admins to manage player queues and game scheduling.

name: Medical Parse
description: A diagnostic tool that lists potential diseases based on user-input symptoms for comprehensive health assessments.

name: Spring to Life
description: A social platform for senior citizens, encouraging interaction and skill maintenance through closed group activities.

name: HitchHigh
description: A ride-sharing app for high school students to access affordable transportation to school and events.

name: Fix People Quitting Drug Trials
description: A tool to identify reasons for dropout in voluntary drug trials and suggest solutions.

name: Proxy Pi
description: Enables a laptop to use the IP address of a Raspberry Pi 3, hiding network activity to enhance privacy and prevent identity theft, with IPTraf to monitor data transmission.

name: uDj
description: A web service hosted on a Raspberry Pi that allows multiple users to collaboratively manage a song queue in real-time via a RESTful API, ideal for parties and social gatherings.

name: You Suck At Music
description: Analyzes saved Spotify songs and playlists, providing an overall popularity rating for each playlist based on Spotify's song popularity metrics.

name: Sword Fight
description: A motion-based game where device movements control attack, defense, and push actions in a battle, with scoring based on player interactions.

name: Melody Player
description: A program that plays melodies on six piezo buzzers with a selectable tune display on an LCD screen, triggered by a button press.

name: Help, Actually
description: A browser extension that evaluates charity websites using Charity Navigator ratings, suggesting alternative charities and providing related news for transparency.

name: Hackathon
description: A competitive racing game where players navigate obstacles and hack each otherâ€™s courses to win.

name: WatsonBot
description: A Discord-based home automation framework using IBM Watson's natural language processing for user-friendly home command execution.

name: Smart Motion Sensor
description: A sensor that detects motion, captures a picture, and sends an alert message to a predefined mobile number.

name: UC Monopoly
description: A simplified Monopoly game featuring property transactions and jail, with a focus on 3D modeling and design.

name: Savor
description: Connects individuals with surplus food to those in need, facilitating community-based food sharing.

name: UCwhatIdidThere
description: An app and API encouraging city exploration through tagged locations that provide information, suitable for city tourism, universities, and large events.

name: Meme Me!
description: Uses Affectiva's facial recognition software to detect emotions and generate personalized memes based on the userâ€™s expression.

name: Space-Shooter
description: A classic space shooter game built in Python using the Pygame library.

name: Live Accountable
description: A budgeting tool that helps users manage their finances based on paycheck allocations.

name: SmartMirror
description: Displays essential daily information such as time, weather, and calendar events on a mirror.

name: Purrfect-Kitties
description: Displays values from the Muse headband and triggers actions, with integration from two repositories that are in progress.

name: RPGBOT
description: Runs a text-based D&D-style adventure via a GroupMe bot, allowing users to engage in RPG gameplay within chat.

name: Project Party Up
description: A group location and chat app that lets users track each other's real-time location, chat, and join or leave groups.

name: Smart434
description: Voice commands from Amazon Echo are sent to IBM IoT, allowing Raspberry Pi to control lighting based on user requests.

name: Benjamin Chat
description: A communication platform with contextual text suggestions, smart home alerts, and ephemeral messaging for enhanced conversations.

name: Reddit Digest Bot
description: Emails users the top posts from specified subreddits, based on a PM sent with email and subreddit details.

name: Watrr
description: A smart water temperature system with mechanical controls to manage shower water flow at desired temperatures.

name: VRtionary
description: A VR version of Pictionary that runs in a browser, allowing multiplayer drawing and guessing games in a virtual environment.

name: Printer Pal (860B3)
description: A Dash-button system to notify school staff about printer issues, including jammed, out of ink, or out of paper.

name: Barking Up The Pong Tree
description: A real-life Pong game projected onto a surface where players control paddles by moving their phones.

name: Polynous
description: A Git-repository cloning tool that creates a workspace for viewing and editing project files, with planned file commit functionality.

name: Stock Extension
description: A Chrome extension that displays stock information in a popup for user-inputted stock tickers.

name: Joys of Coding (aka Wild Compile)
description: A C# web IDE that allows users to submit and execute code, with input-output handling, via a web interface.

name: Hot Wheels
description: A placeholder for a project involving racing or automotive themes.

name: Tweeter
description: Reads aloud tweets with specified hashtags using speech synthesis for auditory engagement with Twitter content.

name: AISee
description: A self-hosted, privacy-focused photo management system with voice search and IBM Watson integration for smart tagging.

name: Technical Interviewer
description: An Alexa skill for conducting technical interviews by asking coded questions, storing results in DynamoDB, and analyzing with IBM Watson.

name: Unboxel VR
description: An interactive VR guessing game where players identify 3D objects hidden under disappearing boxes by speaking out guesses.

name: VCare
description: Monitors patient health with real-time data, sending emergency alerts to hospital staff and physicians via voice assistant and SMS.

name: RevSearch
description: A tool to access, create, and manage files on a computer, designed for ease of file operations.

name: Rank It!
description: A Chrome extension for rating websites with upvote and downvote functionality, inspired by Reddit, to rank user experience.

name: Automatic Pet Feeder
description: Dispenses pet food at set intervals or via a web page, with a future feature to track feeding frequency over 24 hours.

name: HallOfShame
description: A web application that identifies online profiles using abusive language, with a Bad Words Score for ranking users.

name: VRythm
description: A VR rhythm game where players grab spheres on the beat in a 3D environment for an immersive music experience.

name: Alexa Twister Game
description: An Alexa skill that provides randomized Twister instructions, simulating a real game with sound effects and player cues.

name: Hangry Prevention - K1
description: Generates grocery lists based on user purchase history and patterns to prevent missed grocery needs.

name: ReBay
description: ReBay is a reverse auction marketplace where customers post requests, and sellers respond with items at set prices, allowing for downward bidding. This approach speeds up shopping by attracting sellers eager to make sales, unlike traditional eBay.

name: Engineering Solutions Using IoT Device
description: An IoT-based system that uses light sensors to control street lighting based on ambient conditions and temperature sensors to monitor pasteurization, ensuring precise temperature control to prevent overcooking.

name: Bob
description: Bob is a conversational bot that allows users to set reminders with location and attachment details, notifying them at the specified time.

name: uPin
description: A location-based social platform where users can post anonymous or nickname-based pins, engage in discussions, and favorite other users to follow their updates.

name: UCyber Hotspot Sniper
description: A tool that uses a directional antenna and custom software to analyze WiFi signal strength, allowing for precise 3D localization of routers based on real-time data.

name: Book My Music
description: An e-commerce website for music enthusiasts with three categories: 'Create Music' for instruments, 'Cherish Music' for record labels, and 'Experience Music' for accessories.

name: Timer Extension for Google Chrome
description: A Chrome extension that allows users to set a timer for their browsing session, automatically closing tabs when time expires. Users can opt to close tabs in the current window or all windows, with notifications as the session ends.

name: AlwaysProf
description: An Amazon Alexa skill designed to support students by providing in-house professors who offer academic and emotional guidance.

name: ByteSearch
description: A database search solution using NoSQL with optimized time and space complexity. It implements a byte-based database where each value is one byte, enhancing retrieval efficiency.

name: Obelix Search
description: A search tool that takes user input and queries multiple websites to display data and information relevant to the specified term.

name: Intelligent Andro Blue Public Safety
description: A public safety app that uses Bluetooth to send emergency alerts to nearby devices. Each device acts as both server and client, creating a stable network to relay alerts in emergencies.

name: Unity Game
description: A Unity-based game where players engage in combat with a slime opponent.

name: Rainbow Run
description: A fast-paced game where players press the button matching the first LED color on a rainbow strip. Incorrect selections delay progress, and reaching the end in record time sets a high score across four levels.

name: Speed Control with Rotary Sensor
description: An automotive control system that uses a rotary sensor to monitor the car's tilt angle. If the angle exceeds a set limit, it gradually reduces motor speed until an interrupt occurs or the car stops.
